item.title: Engine and Integration Options
item.description: The Core Rule Set can be run using a compatible WAF engine. CRS can also be used via a number of services which feature CRS integration, such as cloud and CDN-based WAF offerings. Compatible WAF Engines ModSecurity ModSecurity comes in two distinct flavors: ModSecurity v2 ModSecurity v3 (aka libmodsecurity) Originally, ModSecurity v2 was designed to work as an Apache module. This is the more stable engine of those available, and it’s also the CRS base target.

item.title: OWASP CRS Quickstart
item.description: Welcome to the OWASP Core RuleSet (CRS) quickstart guide. We will attempt to get you up and running with CRS as quick as possible. This guide assumes ModSecurity is already working. If you are unsure see the extended install page. Otherwise, lets jump in. You’ll first need to download the ruleset. Our strong recommendation is that you use a supported version. Using a browser (or equivalent) visit the following URL: https://github.
